pattern_manufacturing_qc_001.name: Quality Control Inspection
pattern_manufacturing_qc_001.description: Incoming material inspection, in-process quality checks, final product inspection, and rejection handling
examples: Material arrives, inspected for defects, tested for specifications, measurements verified, passed items proceed to production, failed items quarantined and scrapped
Incoming material inspection, functional testing, dimensional verification, quality assessment, good parts to warehouse, defective parts rejected
anti_patterns: Failed parts mixed with good parts

pattern_manufacturing_production_001.name: Production Scheduling and Execution
pattern_manufacturing_production_001.description: Production order creation, resource allocation, scheduling, execution, and completion
examples: Production order received, demand planned, raw materials and labor allocated, production scheduled, execution monitored, KPIs tracked, order completed and delivered
Order creation, capacity planning, resource assignment, production line scheduling, manufacturing execution, quality/quantity monitoring, order completion

pattern_manufacturing_maintenance_001.name: Equipment Maintenance
pattern_manufacturing_maintenance_001.description: Preventive maintenance scheduling, maintenance execution, troubleshooting failures, and equipment upgrade
examples: Maintenance scheduled per equipment manual, preventive maintenance performed, equipment tested, if functional continue operation, if failed diagnose issue, repair performed, equipment restarted
Scheduled preventive maintenance, maintenance tasks execution, post-maintenance testing, equipment failure detection and diagnosis, repair execution, restart verification

pattern_manufacturing_supply_001.name: Supply Chain Management
pattern_manufacturing_supply_001.description: Supplier selection, purchase orders, delivery coordination, inventory management, and supplier performance
examples: Material need identified, qualified supplier selected based on cost/quality/reliability, PO created with specifications, supplier delivers per schedule, receipt inspected, materials warehoused, supplier performance monitored
Supply requirement, vendor evaluation and selection, purchase order issuance, delivery tracking, goods receipt, quality inspection, inventory storage, supplier metrics tracking

pattern_manufacturing_assembly_001.name: Assembly Line Operation
pattern_manufacturing_assembly_001.description: Component preparation, assembly stations, sub-assembly, final assembly, and packaging
examples: Components prepared in parallel at different stations, sub-assemblies created, all sub-components combined for final assembly, product tested, packaged for shipment
Component preparation at multiple stations in parallel, intermediate assembly of subunits, final product assembly, quality validation, packing and labeling
validation_rules: Parallel tasks must complete before joining

pattern_manufacturing_demand_001.name: Demand Forecasting and Planning
pattern_manufacturing_demand_001.description: Sales forecasting, demand aggregation, capacity planning, and inventory optimization
examples: Sales department forecasts demand by product, aggregates to total manufacturing requirement, capacity planning validates feasibility, inventory targets set, execution plan created, actual performance monitored and forecast adjusted
Sales forecasting, demand consolidation, production capacity verification, safety stock determination, production planning, execution tracking, forecast accuracy improvement

pattern_manufacturing_shipment_001.name: Product Shipment and Logistics
pattern_manufacturing_shipment_001.description: Order fulfillment, warehouse picking, packaging, shipping documentation, carrier handoff, and delivery
examples: Order ready for fulfillment, items picked from warehouse, packed with protective materials, labeled with tracking number, shipping docs prepared, handed to carrier, delivery tracked, customer receives shipment
Fulfillment initiation, warehouse picking, packaging assembly, labeling and documentation, carrier handoff, shipment tracking, delivery confirmation
